characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Whenever a roll is made to set one of the Giant Chaos Spawn's mutable characteristics (see Damage table) and a 1 or a 6 is rolled on any D6 or D3, the Giant Chaos Spawn gains D3 Wounds. This may be used to take it above its starting total of 10 wounds. If the Giant Chaos Spawn ever reaches a total of 20 or more Wounds, it gains the Titanic keyword until its Wounds total is reduced to 19 or less.
